text: Illinois 7th congressional district is a congressional district in the state of Illinois. The district covers the towns and cities of Bellwood, Chicago, Forest Park, Oak Park, Maywood, and Westchester. The district elects a representative to represent the district is the United States House of Representatives. The district is currently represented by Democrat Danny K. Davis who has represented the district since January 1997. The 16th President of the United States, Abraham Lincoln used to represent this district from 1847 to 1849. ==Election history== Year Office Results 2000 President Gore 81 - 16% 2004 President Kerry 83 - 17% 2008 President Obama 89 - 9% 2012 President Obama 87 - 11% 2016 President Clinton 78% - 19% 2020 President Biden 86% - 12% ==References== Category:Abraham Lincoln 07
title: Illinois's 7th congressional district
